comment._content: The Political Archives Group was responsible for compiling the book Sources in Political History, 1900-1951 and its successor volume, Sources in Contemporary British History, both very handy publications if you are researching modern British history. Chris has retained his connection with LSE: he visits the Library on pretty much a daily basis, and I've also seen him in the Senior Common Room, reading the newspapers. He's currently working on the guide to European political archives, and is the editor of Pears Cyclopaedia Philip Jones went on to work on another archives sources book, Britain and Palestine 1914-1948 : archival sources for the history of the British mandate. Jeffrey Weeks is now a leading historian and sociologist of sexuality, currently based at London South Bank University.
